We specialize in providing high-quality shearing and folding services for a wide range of industries. With our cutting-edge technology and skilled craftsmanship, we deliver precise and efficient solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients.

With our cutting-edge technology and skilled craftsmanship, we deliver precise and efficient solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients.Get StartedPrecision Shearing and Folding ServicesAt VJ Shearing and Folding, we specialize in providing top-notch shearing and folding services to meet your metal fabrication needs. With a commitment to excellence and a passion for innovation, we have established ourselves as leaders in the industry.Precise Metal CuttingOur state-of-the-art shearing machines deliver accurate results, whether it's straight cuts or intricate shapes, meeting your project's specifications with precision.Expert Folding ServicesWe provide expert folding services to create clean and precise bends in metal sheets, ensuring your projects are free from defects and meet the highest quality standards.ServicesCheck out the great services we offerPrecision Shearing:We provide precise metal sheet cutting for materials such as steel, aluminum, and stainless steel, ensuring accurate results, whether it's straight cuts or intricate shapes.Expert FoldingOur expert folding services produce clean and accurate bends in metal sheets, meeting your project specifications with precision.Tailored SolutionsWith our material expertise, we transform your ideas into exceptional metal fabrication results, be it a one-time project or a long-term partnership.Quality AssuranceWe maintain strict quality control to guarantee consistently accurate and reliable metal components.PortfolioCheck out our beautifull portfolioAllAppCardWebApp 1AppWeb 3WebApp 2AppCard 2CardWeb 2WebApp 3AppCard 1CardCard 3CardWeb 3WebContact UsContact us the get startedLocation:No. 3, North Phase, 1st Cross Street, SIDCO Industrial Estate, Ambattur, Chennai, TamilNadu 600098.Email:vjshearingfolding@gmail.comCall:9444460067 , 9344163371Your NameYour EmailSubjectMessageLoadingYour message has been sent.
